selected_skills.name: extract_ages_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: To extract the ages of two individuals from the image.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to read and extract the ages of Person 1 and Person 2 from the provided image data.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the age gap between the two individuals.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to subtract the age of Person 2 from the age of Person 1 to find the age gap.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the calculated age gap as the final answer.
